column1: * '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] recovers from his trench fever to the degree that he can do home service. He is promoted to full lieutenant.

column2: who would voice the [[Barliman Butterbur|"Innkeeper"]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)]]

column1: * '''[[11 November|11]]''' - [[World War I|The War]] comes to an end.
* '''?''' - Tolkien is accepted as a junior staff member of the ''New English Dictionary''
column2: later called the ''[[Oxford English Dictionary]]''. He worked with words beginning with the letter "w".
